apis.name: JSONPlaceholder
apis.description: Get the mock JSON data from an API REST. The entities allowed are posts, comments, albums, users, photos and todos.

executables.name: VideoSizeReducer
executables.description: Reduce the size of a video file by converting it to a lower resolution and/or lower bitrate. Receives the path to the video file as a parameter.

executables.name: DolarHoy
executables.description: Get the current dollar price in Argentina and append it to a csv file.
